author: DAN CASEY The Roanoke Times
title: CASEY: Upcoming pro-democracy events in Roanoke and New River Valleys
description: One's a movie in Roanoke about famed economist Robert Reich, who served as secretary of labor in the Clinton White House. The other's a gathering in a Blacksburg church where experts will explain what's on the line with November's elections.
